Text:
@concerned,

Ha!  You must be an old Head.  Me too!  :)
Thanks for the upload man. Im only 22 but I love the oldies. Ralph Bakshi is one of my top animators.
thank you mr old head, from me and mary-jane!
I heard this has furry tits but no sex. Wikipedia says "Its success led to a slew of other X-rated animated films" would anyone know what these were?
Thanks so much!! Crumb didn't care for this, but I LOVED it - can't wait to relive my misspent youth.
